verses.verse: As many as are under a crossbeam (slaves) must regard their own owners as deserving of all value so that no hurtful things may be said about the name and the instruction of God.

The slaves who have trusting owners must not ignore them because they are brothers. But instead they must be their slaves because they are trusting and loved owners, the owners assisting in the humane thing. Teach and encourage these things.

If anyone teaches a different doctrine and does not come forward to messages that are healthy (the messages of our Master Jesus, the Anointed King) and to the instruction that is in line with godliness,
he has been blinded by smoke, being aware of nothing, but ill concerning questionings and arguments over words, from which happen envy, fighting, hurtful comments, evil suspicions,
societies of people who have been devoured in their way of thinking and who have been robbed of the truth, assuming the godliness to be a way to get gain. Stay away from these types of people.
The godliness with contentment is a way to get huge gain.
You see, we carried nothing into the world. It is obvious that neither are we able to carry anything out.
Having nourishments and covers, with these we will be content.
But the people intending to be rich fall into trouble, a trap, and desires (many unobservant and hurtful), some that sink the people into destruction and ruin.
You see, a root of all kinds of the bad things is the fondness for money, of which, as some reached out for it, they were misled away from the trust and stabbed themselves through with many agonies.
But you, O person of God, escape these things. Pursue the right way, godliness, trust, love, persistence to do what is right, humility.
Struggle in the nice struggle of the trust. Latch on to the life that spans all time, into which you also were invited and acknowledged the nice acknowledgment in the sight of many witnesses.
I pass the order on to you in the sight of God (the One who gives life to all things) and the Anointed King Jesus (who told what He witnessed before Pontius Pilate in the nice acknowledgment)
for you to keep the demand unspotted, unattackable up to the manifestation of our Master Jesus, the Anointed King,
that He will show at their own right times, the blessed and only competent ruler, the King of the ones who are kings and the Master of the ones who are masters,
the only One having deathlessness, having a house in unapproachable light, whom no one (of people) saw, neither is able to see, to whom belongs value and power that spans all time. Amen.

To the rich people in the present span of time, pass on the order not to be focusing on high things, neither to have anticipated good based on the obscurity of wealth but in God, the living God, the One who richly provides everything to us for enjoyment,
to be working good, to be rich in nice actions, to be benevolent, sharing,
saving up for themselves a nice foundation for the time that is going to come, so that they might latch on to the life that spans all time.
O Timothy, guard the thing placed down alongside of you, turning from the profane meaningless voices and opposing positions of the falsely named knowledge,

that as some promise to have it, they miss the target concerning the trust. May the generosity be with you. Amen. [This first letter was written to Timothy from Laodicia, a certain city that is a mother city of Phrygia Pacatiana]
